Package com.intellij.ui

Class RelativeFont

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.ui.RelativeFont
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener

    public final class RelativeFont
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
    This class is intended to update a component's font automatically, if the default font is changed on L&F update.

      • family

        public RelativeFont family(java.lang.String family)
        Parameters:
        family - a new family to derive font
        Returns:
        a new instance with the specified family

      • style

        public RelativeFont style(int style)
        Parameters:
        style - a new style to derive font
        Returns:
        a new instance with the specified style

      • large

        public RelativeFont large()
        Returns:
        a new instance with increased font size

      • small

        public RelativeFont small()
        Returns:
        a new instance with decreased font size

      • install

        public <T extends java.awt.Component> T install(T component)
        Installs this instance on the specified component. It adds the "font" property change listener that replaces a component's font with the relative one.
        Parameters:
        component - the component to install on
        Returns:
        the same component

      • uninstallFrom

        public static <T extends java.awt.Component> T uninstallFrom(T component)
        Uninstalls all instances from the specified component. It just removes all the "font" property change listeners without any font modification.
        Parameters:
        component - the component to uninstall from
        Returns:
        the same component

      • derive

        public java.awt.Font derive(java.awt.Font font)
        Creates a new font by replicating the specified one and applying a new family, style, and/or size.
        Parameters:
        font - the font to modify
        Returns:
        a new font, or the specified one if a change is not needed

      • propertyChange

        public void propertyChange(java.beans.PropertyChangeEvent event)
        Specified by:
        propertyChange in interface java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
